honors_and_awards.title: Institute Organizational Awards
honors_and_awards.publication: Dean of Student Affairs, IIT Bombay
honors_and_awards.description: Institute Organizational Citation Awarded by Dean SA for the outstanding contribution throughout my stay in IIT Bombay Institute Executive Color'17 Awarded the highest organizational recognition for exceptional work in student office. Awarded to only 3 students from IIT Bombay. Institute Organizational Color'16 Awarded by the Student Gymkhana for excellence in displaying organization skills during the tenure.

honors_and_awards.title: Sports Honours
honors_and_awards.description:  Contingent leader of 51st Inter-IIT sports meet; part of Gold winning Weightlifting team for 50th Inter IIT Sports Meet  Won 3 consecutive Gold medals in Powerlifting open; secured Gold in Weightlifting championship at District Level

honors_and_awards.title: Academic Excellence Award
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded for highest CPI in the department for the academic year 2015-16

honors_and_awards.title: Undergraduate Research Award
